sentence.text: The downstream pathways of Nodal-negative regulation of intracellular estrogen receptor signaling pathway play a critical role not only in L-R determination in the lateral plate mesoderm but also in myocardial specification and differentiation in the AHF, suggesting that TGA is a phenotype in heterotaxia as well as the primary developmental defect of the AHF.

entity.text: negative regulation of intracellular estrogen receptor signaling pathway
